statements: SELECT property_id, property_name, property_price FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_location='New York'
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type='House'
SELECT property_name, property_size FROM PropertyListings ORDER BY property_size DESC
SELECT property_id, property_price FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type='Apartment' ORDER BY property_price ASC
SELECT DISTINCT property_type FROM PropertyListings
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type = 'House' ORDER BY property_price DESC
SELECT property_name, property_type, property_location FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_price > 100000 ORDER BY property_price ASC
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type, property_price FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_location LIKE '%York%' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_size >= 2000 AND property_price < 500000 ORDER BY property_price ASC, property_size DESC
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_description FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type IN ('Apartment', 'Condo')
SELECT * FROM luxury_property_listings;
SELECT property_name, property_location FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_price > 500000;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM luxury_property_listings ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_location FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_location = 'Beverly Hills';
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_price BETWEEN 300000 AND 700000;
SELECT * FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_price > 500000 ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_location, property_price FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_price BETWEEN 300000 AND 700000 ORDER BY property_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, preferred_property_location FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_property_location LIKE '%Beach%' AND preferred_property_price_range = 'High';
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_price FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_location = 'Los Angeles' AND property_price < 400000 ORDER BY property_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference, location, property_type, max_price FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT listing_id, property_name, location, price FROM property_listings WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, preference FROM customers WHERE preference = 'House';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE price > 500000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT property_name, price, location FROM property_listings WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.property_name, p.price FROM customers c INNER JOIN customer_preferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id INNER JOIN property_listings p ON cp.property_type = p.property_type AND cp.location = p.location WHERE cp.max_price >= p.price;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT title, price, location FROM Properties WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, property_id, time_sent FROM Notifications ORDER BY time_sent ASC;
SELECT search_id, min_price, max_price, location FROM Searches WHERE min_price >= 100000 AND max_price <= 200000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT title, description, price FROM Properties WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, title, price FROM Customers, Properties WHERE Customers.customer_id = 2 AND Properties.property_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Searches WHERE min_price > 10000 AND location LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Properties ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_property_listings;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE property_type = 'Villa';
SELECT id, property_name, property_price, location FROM luxury_property_listings ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT id, property_type, location FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM luxury_property_listings;
SELECT property_name, property_type, property_price FROM luxury_property_listings WHERE location='San Francisco';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, property_id, sent_date FROM notification_queue WHERE status='pending' ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
